[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat Set

noncomputable abbrev omnimath1358_answer : ℝ := sorry
theorem omnimath1358
: IsGreatest {y : ℝ | ∃ x > 0, y = (x ^ 2 + 2 - Real.sqrt (x ^ 4 + 4)) / x} omnimath1358_answer :=
sorry
